name: SAP Dashboards
description: Monitor SAP systems and applications performances

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT uniqueCount(INSTANCE) as 'Num of Instances' WHERE metricName = 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.CPU_UTILIZATION' SINCE 30 minutes ago FACET SYS_ID
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.CPU_UTILIZATION) as 'CPU Usage %' WHERE metricName = 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.CPU_UTILIZATION' SINCE 30 minutes ago FACET INSTANCE, HOST_NAME LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.USER.LOGON) as 'Number Loggon #' WHERE metricName = 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.USER.LOGON' AND INSTANCE = 'TOTAL' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 15 minutes FACET SYS_ID
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.DIALOG.RESPONSE_TIME) / 1000 as 'RESPONSE TIME' WHERE metricName = 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.DIALOG.RESPONSE_TIME' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO FACET SYS_ID
FROM Log SELECT count(*) as 'Errors' WHERE level = 'Error' SINCE 1 day ago WHERE agentName != 'Infrastructure' LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO FACET SYS_ID
FROM NR_SAP_LOCK_ENTRIES SELECT count(*) FACET SYS_ID, Lock_Mode SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM NR_SAP_LOCK_ENTRIES SELECT Table_name, User_Name, SYS_ID, Client, Date AS 'Lock Date', Time AS 'Locking Time', Microseconds,`Locking_period(S)`, Lock_Mode,  Lock_Object, Work_Process, DESTINATION, Counter, Counter_1, Counter_2, Use_Counter, Lock_Argument, Lock_Owner where timestamp = (SELECT latest(timestamp) FROM NR_SAP_LOCK_ENTRIES) SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX
FROM Log SELECT CATEGORY,SUBCATEGORY, message, level, SYS_ID, INSTANCE, HOST_NAME SINCE 1 day ago WHERE agentName != 'Infrastructure' LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.WP.INFORMATION) WHERE metricName = 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.WP.INFORMATION' and WP_TYPE in ('DIA', 'BTC') AND INSTANCE != 'TOTAL' SINCE 1 day ago FACET INSTANCE, WP_TYPE, WP_STATUS TIMESERIES 10 minutes
FROM Metric SELECT average(`NR.SAP.SYSTEM.MEMORY.EXTENDED_USAGE%`) as Extended, average(`NR.SAP.SYSTEM.MEMORY.HEAP_USAGE%`) as Heap SINCE 1 day ago FACET INSTANCE TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.USER.LOGON) as 'Number Loggon #' WHERE metricName = 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.USER.LOGON' AND INSTANCE != 'TOTAL' FACET INSTANCE SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.DIALOG.RESPONSE_TIME) / 1000 WHERE metricName = 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.DIALOG.RESPONSE_TIME' FACET INSTANCE SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Log SELECT count(*) as 'Errors' WHERE level = 'Error' SINCE 1 day ago WHERE agentName != 'Infrastructure' FACET INSTANCE LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Log SELECT CATEGORY,SUBCATEGORY, message, level, INSTANCE, HOST_NAME SINCE 1 day ago WHERE agentName != 'Infrastructure' LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.CPU.USAGE.SYSTEM) as 'System', average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.CPU.USAGE.USER) as 'User', average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.CPU.USAGE.IOWAIT) as 'IOWait' SINCE 20 minutes ago FACET HOST_NAME ORDER BY HOST_NAME LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.CPU.USAGE.SYSTEM) as System, average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.CPU.USAGE.USER) as User, average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.CPU.USAGE.IOWAIT) as IOWait SINCE 1 day ago FACET HOST_NAME TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.MEMORY.FREE) / average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.MEMORY.CONFIGURED) * 100 AS 'Percent Memory Free', average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.MEMORY.FREE)/1000 as 'GB Free', average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.MEMORY.CONFIGURED) / 1000 as 'GB Configured' SINCE 20 minutes ago FACET HOST_NAME
FROM Metric SELECT  average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.MEMORY.FREE) / average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.MEMORY.CONFIGURED) * 100 AS 'Percent Memory Free' SINCE 1 day ago FACET HOST_NAME TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT latest(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.FILESYSTEM.USAGE) as 'Percentage Used' WHERE metricName = 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.FILESYSTEM.USAGE' FACET HOST_NAME, OBJECT SINCE 1 hour ago LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.NETWORK.INBOUND) AS 'Packets received', average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.NETWORK.OUTBOUND) AS 'Packets transmitted' FACET HOST_NAME SINCE 1 hour ago TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: By System, Job Server Group, Instance

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_JOB_ALL SELECT uniqueCount(JOB_NAME) as 'No. of Jobs' FACET SYS_ID, JobServerGroup, INSTANCE SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX WHERE Status NOT IN ('RELEASED')

FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.WP.INFORMATION) WHERE metricName = 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.WP.INFORMATION' and WP_TYPE in ('BTC') AND INSTANCE != 'TOTAL' SINCE 1 day ago FACET SYS_ID, WP_STATUS TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM NR_SAP_JOB_ALL SELECT average(Run_Time), average(Wait_Time) FACET SYS_ID, JobServerGroup, INSTANCE TIMESERIES AUTO SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Num of Job Run by Time

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_JOB_ALL SELECT count(*) as 'Num Job Run' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO FACET SYS_ID, JobServerGroup, INSTANCE

FROM NR_SAP_JOB_ALL SELECT filter(uniqueCount(JOB_ID), where Status = 'FINISHED') as 'üü¢ Finished #', percentage(uniqueCount(JOB_ID), where Status = 'FINISHED') as 'üü¢ Finished %', filter(uniqueCount(JOB_ID), where Status = 'CANCELED') as 'üî¥ Canceled #', percentage(uniqueCount(JOB_ID), where Status = 'CANCELED') as 'üî¥ Canceled %', filter(uniqueCount(JOB_ID), where Status in ('FINISHED', 'CANCELED')) as '#Ô∏è‚É£ Total', average(Wait_Time) as 'üïê Avg Wait', average(Run_Time) as 'üïê Avg Run' WHERE Status IN ('CANCELED', 'FINISHED') SINCE 1 day ago FACET SYS_ID, JOB_NAME LIMIT MAX

FROM NR_SAP_JOB_ALL SELECT latest(HOST_NAME), latest(INSTANCE),latest(Status), latest(Run_Time), latest(Wait_Time), latest(SCHEDULE_START_AT), latest(STARTED_AT), latest(ENDED_AT) SINCE 24 hours ago FACET SYS_ID, JOB_NAME LIMIT MAX
FROM Log SELECT SUBCATEGORY as Job, message, SYS_ID, INSTANCE, CLIENT  WHERE CATEGORY = 'ABAP Aborted Jobs' SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT SYS_ID, JOB_NAME, JOB_ID, Status, SCHEDULED_AT, SCHEDULE_START_AT, STARTED_AT, Run_Time, Wait_Time FROM (SELECT latest(Status)as Status, latest(Wait_Time) AS Wait_Time, latest(Run_Time) AS Run_Time FROM NR_SAP_JOB_ALL WHERE JOB_NAME IN (FROM NR_SAP_JOB_ALL SELECT uniques(JOB_NAME) WHERE Status IN ('RUNNING', 'READY') LIMIT MAX) FACET SYS_ID, JOB_NAME, JOB_ID, SCHEDULED_AT, SCHEDULE_START_AT, STARTED_AT) WHERE Status IN ('RUNNING', 'READY') SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX
FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT max(Response_Time) as 'Max', average(Response_Time) as 'Avg' SINCE 1 day ago FACET SAP_EID as 'Transaction' LIMIT 20
FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT average(Response_Time) SINCE 1 day ago FACET Program TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Max Response TIme(ms) by Transaction Type

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT max(Response_Time) SINCE 1 day ago FACET Task_Type_Name LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Max Response TIme(ms) by Business Process

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT max(Response_Time) FACET BUSIPROC_0001 SINCE 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT average(Response_Time) SINCE 1 day ago WHERE Task_Type in ('65','66') FACET CASES (WHERE Task_Type =  '65' AS 'HTTP', WHERE Task_Type = '66' AS 'HTTPS') TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT average(Response_Time) SINCE 1 day ago WHERE Task_Type in ('FE') FACET CASES (WHERE Task_Type =  'FE' AS 'RFC') TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT average(Wait_Time) SINCE 1 day ago FACET Program TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT count(*) SINCE 1 day ago FACET Program TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT SAP_EID, T_Code, Task_Type_Name, Response_Time, Process_Time, Wait_Time, Roll_Wait_Time, CPU_Time, GUI_Net_Time, GUI_Time, DB_Time, User, Terminal_ID, BUSIPROC_0001 as 'Business Process', BUSIFUNC_0001 as 'Business Function' SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX

FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT average(Response_Time), count(*), average(GUI_Time), average(Process_Time), average(DB_Time), average(CPU_Time) WHERE Task_Type_Name = 'DIALOG' FACET SAP_EID SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT  10
FROM NR_SAP_PROGRAM SELECT average(Response_Time) WHERE Task_Type_Name = 'DIALOG' FACET SAP_EID LIMIT 10 SINCE 7 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM NR_SAP_HDB_SERVICES SELECT latest(ACTIVE_STATUS) SINCE 20 minutes ago FACET SYS_ID
FROM NR_SAP_HDB_SERVICES SELECT latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Checked', latest(ACTIVE_STATUS) FACET SYS_ID, HOST, PORT, SERVICE_NAME, SQL_PORT, PROCESS_ID SINCE 1 hour ago

FROM Metric SELECT latest(NR.SAP.HDB.METRICS) /1024 /1024 /1024 WHERE  KEY_FIGURE IN ('INSTANCE_TOTAL_MEMORY_ALLOCATED_SIZE', 'INSTANCE_TOTAL_MEMORY_USED_SIZE','INSTANCE_TOTAL_MEMORY_PEAK_USED_SIZE') FACET SYS_ID, CASES (WHERE KEY_FIGURE = 'INSTANCE_TOTAL_MEMORY_ALLOCATED_SIZE' AS 'Total Allocated', WHERE KEY_FIGURE = 'INSTANCE_TOTAL_MEMORY_USED_SIZE' AS 'Used', WHERE KEY_FIGURE = 'INSTANCE_TOTAL_MEMORY_PEAK_USED_SIZE' AS 'Peak Used') SINCE 15 minutes ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

FROM Metric SELECT latest(NR.SAP.HDB.METRICS)/1024/1024/1024  WHERE KEY_FIGURE in ('FREE_PHYSICAL_MEMORY', 'USED_PHYSICAL_MEMORY') FACET SYS_ID, CASES (WHERE KEY_FIGURE = 'FREE_PHYSICAL_MEMORY' AS 'Free Physical Memory', WHERE KEY_FIGURE = 'USED_PHYSICAL_MEMORY' AS 'Used Physical Memory') COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM Metric SELECT latest(NR.SAP.HDB.METRICS)  WHERE  KEY_FIGURE IN ('LOG','TRACE', 'DATA') FACET SYS_ID, KEY_FIGURE SINCE 15 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT latest(NR.SAP.HDB.METRICS) /1024 /1024/1024  WHERE  KEY_FIGURE IN ('FREE_SWAP_SPACE', 'USED_SWAP_SPACE') FACET SYS_ID, KEY_FIGURE SINCE 15 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT latest(NR.SAP.HDB.METRICS) WHERE KEY_FIGURE in ('CPU_CORES', 'CPU_THREADS') FACET entity.name, KEY_FIGURE SINCE 15 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.HDB.METRICS) as CPU_Percent WHERE KEY_FIGURE = 'HOST_CPU' TIMESERIES AUTO SINCE 8 hours ago
FROM NR_SAP_HDB_ALERT SELECT * SINCE 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_HDB_DELTAMERGE SELECT count(*) FACET TYPE SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_HDB_DELTAMERGE SELECT HOST, PORT, SCHEMA_NAME, TABLE_NAME, PART_ID, TYPE, EXECUTION_TIME, MERGED_DELTA_RECORDS, MOTIVATION, ERROR_DESCRIPTION SINCE 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_HDB_TOP_CS_TABLE SELECT latest(MEMORY_SIZE_IN_MAIN) /1024 /1024 /1024 AS 'MEMORY SIZE IN MAIN(GB)', latest(RECORD_COUNT) FACET TABLE_NAME, SCHEMA_NAME, HOST, PORT SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 15

widgets.title: Top Column Store Tables Size Change

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_HDB_TOP_RS_TABLE SELECT latest(ALLOCATED_FIXED_PART_SIZE + ALLOCATED_VARIABLE_PART_SIZE) /1024 /1024 /1024 AS 'ALLOCATED_SIZE(GB)' FACET TABLE_NAME, SCHEMA_NAME, HOST, PORT SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 2 hours

FROM NR_SAP_HDB_TOP_RS_TABLE SELECT latest(ALLOCATED_FIXED_PART_SIZE + ALLOCATED_VARIABLE_PART_SIZE) /1024 /1024 /1024 AS 'ALLOCATED_SIZE(GB)' FACET TABLE_NAME, SCHEMA_NAME, HOST, PORT SINCE 120 minutes ago

widgets.title: Top Row Store Tables Size Change

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_HDB_TOP_RS_TABLE SELECT latest(ALLOCATED_FIXED_PART_SIZE + ALLOCATED_VARIABLE_PART_SIZE) /1024 /1024 /1024 AS 'ALLOCATED_SIZE(GB)' FACET TABLE_NAME, SCHEMA_NAME, HOST, PORT SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 2 hours
FROM Metric SELECT latest(NR.SAP.DB.KPI.AVAILABLE) FACET entity.name SINCE 20 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.KPI.AVAILABLE) FACET entity.name TIMESERIES 5 minutes SINCE 1 day ago

FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.KPI.SIZE)/1000 as `DB Size(GB)`, average(NR.SAP.DB.KPI.USED)/ 1000 as `Used (GB)`, average(NR.SAP.DB.KPI.USED)/average(NR.SAP.DB.KPI.SIZE) * 100 as `Percent Used` FACET entity.name SINCE 20 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.KPI.USED) / average(NR.SAP.DB.KPI.SIZE) * 100 as `DB Space Usage %` FACET entity.name TIMESERIES 5 minutes SINCE 1 day ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.SYSTEM.PROCESS) WHERE metricName= 'NR.SAP.SYSTEM.PROCESS' and KEY_FIGURE = 'DB Time' SINCE 1 day ago FACET SYS_ID TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Span SELECT  filter(Count(*), WHERE STATUS_CODE LIKE '2%') AS 'üü¢ Success', filter(Count(*), WHERE STATUS_CODE LIKE '4%' OR STATUS_CODE LIKE '5%')  AS 'üî¥ Error', filter(Count(*), WHERE STATUS_CODE LIKE '3%') AS 'üü° Redirect', average(`Call_Time(ms)`), average(`Execution_Time(ms)`) WHERE SAP_ETYPE ='HTTPDEST' FACET SYS_ID, PROTOCOL, DESTINATION , PATH SINCE 1 day ago
FROM Span SELECT  average(`Call_Time(ms)`) AS Call_Time WHERE SAP_ETYPE ='HTTPDEST' FACET name  SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Span SELECT name, PATH, SYS_ID, STATUS_CODE, STATUS_PHASE, `Call_Time(ms)`,  `Execution_Time(ms)`, `Receive_Time(ms)`, `Data_Received(b)`, `Data_Send(b)`, INSTANCE,ROOT_CONTEXT_ID, TRANSACTION_ID,CONNECTION_ID WHERE SAP_ETYPE ='HTTPDEST' SINCE  1 day ago
FROM Log select SYS_ID, CATEGORY, SUBCATEGORY, ERROR_CATEGORY,  message, ERROR_CONTEXT WHERE ( message LIKE '%HTTP%' OR message LIKE '%http%' ) AND level = 'Error' SINCE 1 day ago

FROM NR_SAP_ODATA_SERVICE SELECT count(*) as Num_of_calls, average(Processing_Time), average(Application_Time), average(SAP_GW_Backend_Overhead), average(Request_Size), average(Response_Size) FACET SYS_ID, Service_Name, User_Name, Entity_Type SINCE 1 day ago

FROM NR_SAP_ODATA_SERVICE_ERROR SELECT SYS_ID, Message_ID, ERROR_TEXT, ERROR_COUNT, USERNAME, DESTINATION, REQUEST_URI, REQUEST_DATA, ERROR_COMPONENT, ERROR_CONTEXT,ERROR_PACKAGE, SOURCE_INCLUDE, SO, SOURCE_PROGRAM,SUBNO, EXPIRY_DATE, FIRST_DATE, FIRST_TIME, GW_SERVICE, LOCAL_DATE, LOCAL_TIME, LOCATION, LOG_LEVEL, T100_MSGID, T100_MSGNO, T100_MSGV2, T100_MSGV3 SINCE 1 day ago
FROM Span SELECT count(*) AS RFC_Calls WHERE SAP_ETYPE ='RFCDEST' FACET SYS_ID SINCE 1 day ago
FROM Span SELECT average(duration.ms)  AS 'Average Calling Time' WHERE SAP_ETYPE ='RFCDEST' FACET FUNCTION_NAME SINCE 1 day ago
FROM Span SELECT sum(`DATA_RECEIVE(b)`+ `DATA_SEND(b)`) / 1000000 AS 'Data Transmitted(MB)' WHERE SAP_ETYPE ='RFCDEST' FACET SYS_ID SINCE 1 day ago
FROM Span SELECT average(duration.ms) AS 'Average Calling Time' WHERE SAP_ETYPE ='RFCDEST' WHERE DESTINATION NOT IN ('a_rfc', 'bgRFC', 'BGRFC_SUPER') FACET DESTINATION SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Total tRFC Calls with SYSFAIL Error

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_TRFC_STATUS SELECT count(*) WHERE RFC_STATUS = 'SYSFAIL' FACET SYS_ID, RFC_STATUS SINCE 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_TRFC_STATUS SELECT count(*) WHERE RFC_STATUS = 'SYSFAIL' FACET SYS_ID, RFC_STATUS SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minutes

widgets.title: Total tRFC Calls with CPIC Error

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_TRFC_STATUS SELECT count(*) WHERE RFC_STATUS = 'CPICERR' FACET SYS_ID SINCE 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_TRFC_STATUS SELECT COUNT(*) WHERE RFC_STATUS = 'CPICERR' TIMESERIES 10 minutes FACET SYS_ID, RFC_STATUS SINCE 1 DAY AGO

widgets.title: Total qRFC Calls with SYSFAIL Error

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_QRFC_STATUS SELECT count(*) WHERE RFC_STATUS = 'SYSFAIL' FACET SYS_ID SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_QRFC_STATUS SELECT count(*) WHERE RFC_STATUS = 'SYSFAIL' FACET SYS_ID SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minutes

widgets.title: Total qRFC Calls with CPIC Error

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_QRFC_STATUS SELECT count(*) WHERE RFC_STATUS = 'CPICERR' FACET SYS_ID SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Trend - qRFC Calls with CPIC Error

nrqlQueries.query: FROM NR_SAP_QRFC_STATUS SELECT count(*) WHERE RFC_STATUS = 'CPICERR' FACET SYS_ID SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minutes
FROM NR_SAP_TRFC_STATUS SELECT * SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX
FROM NR_SAP_QRFC_STATUS SELECT * SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX
FROM Span SELECT * WHERE SAP_ETYPE ='RFCDEST' SINCE 1 day ago

FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) AS 'Total Number Inbound', filter(uniqueCount(DOCNUM), WHERE STATUS_LIGHT = 'RED') AS 'Total Number Error' WHERE DIRECTION = 'INBOUND' SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) AS 'Total Number Outbound', filter(uniqueCount(DOCNUM), WHERE STATUS_LIGHT = 'RED') AS 'Total Number Error' WHERE DIRECTION = 'OUTBOUND' SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) FACET DIRECTION SINCE 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) FACET DIRECTION SINCE 7 days ago TIMESERIES 2 hours
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) FACET MESSAGE_TYPE SINCE 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC  SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) FACET MESSAGE_TYPE, MESSAGE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION SINCE 7 days ago TIMESERIES 2 hours
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) FACET PRN_DESC SINCE 1 day ago
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) FACET PRN_DESC SINCE 7 days ago TIMESERIES 2 hours
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC  SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) WHERE STATUS_LIGHT = 'RED' SINCE 1 day ago FACET DIRECTION TIMESERIES 1 hour
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) WHERE STATUS_LIGHT = 'RED' SINCE 1 day ago FACET MESSAGE_TYPE,MESSAGE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION TIMESERIES 1 hour
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT average(`Processing_Time(S)`) WHERE `Processing_Time(S)` IS NOT NULL SINCE 2 days ago FACET DIRECTION TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT max(`Processing_Time(S)`) WHERE `Processing_Time(S)` IS NOT NULL SINCE 2 days ago FACET DIRECTION TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) WHERE STATUS_LIGHT = 'RED' SINCE 1 day ago FACET DIRECTION
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) WHERE STATUS_LIGHT = 'RED' SINCE 1 days ago FACET STATUS, STATUS_DESCRIPTION
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) WHERE STATUS_LIGHT = 'RED' SINCE 1 days ago FACET MESSAGE_TYPE
FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT uniqueCount(DOCNUM) WHERE STATUS_LIGHT = 'RED' SINCE 1 days ago FACET PRN

FROM NR_SAP_IDOC SELECT DOCNUM, STATUS, STATUS_DESCRIPTION, STATUS_TEXT, STATUS_GROUP, DIRECTION, MESSAGE_TYPE, MESSAGE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, OUTPUT_MODE, RECEIVER_PARTNER_NUMBER, RECEIVER_PARTNER_TYPE, RECEIVER_PORT, SENDER_PARTNER_NUMBER, SENDER_PARTNER_TYPE, SENDER_PORT, MAX_IDOC_SEGMENT_NUMBER, APP WHERE STATUS_LIGHT = 'RED' SINCE 1 days ago LIMIT MAX
FROM NR_SAP_INTEGRATION_SERVICE SELECT count(*) SINCE 1 day ago FACET SYS_ID, STATUS_GROUP
FROM NR_SAP_INTEGRATION_SERVICE SELECT count(*) SINCE 1 day ago FACET SYS_ID, Processing_Status
FROM NR_SAP_INTEGRATION_SERVICE SELECT count(*) SINCE 1 day ago FACET Interface
FROM NR_SAP_INTEGRATION_SERVICE SELECT count(*) SINCE 1 day ago FACET Adapter_Type
FROM NR_SAP_INTEGRATION_SERVICE SELECT average(TOTAL_TIME) as 'Total Time' SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM NR_SAP_INTEGRATION_SERVICE SELECT SYS_ID, Error_ID, Error_Information, Message_Status, Processing_Status, STATUS_GROUP WHERE STATUS_GROUP = 'ERROR' SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX

FROM NR_SAP_INTEGRATION_SERVICE SELECT SYS_ID, Interface, Message_Size, Message_Status, Processing_Status, Location, Queue_Name, Adapter_Type, Communication_Type, Persistency_Type, TOTAL_TIME, Message_ID, Client, Error_ID,Error_Information, Execution_Date, Execution_Time, Expiry_Date,Root_Context_ID,Transaction_ID,Receiver_Interface_Name,Receiver_Interface_Namespace, Receiver_Operation,Sender_Interface_Name,Sender_Interface_Namespace, Sender_Operation,Sender_Party, User, Changed_by SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT MAX
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.ORACLE.BufferRatio) SINCE 1 day ago FACET entity.name TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.ORACLE.UserCall) SINCE 1 day ago FACET entity.name TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.ORACLE.PhyWrite) SINCE 1 day ago FACET entity.name TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.ORACLE.LogicalRead) SINCE 1 day ago FACET entity.name TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.ORACLE.UserCommit) SINCE 1 day ago FACET entity.name TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.ORACLE.PhyRead) SINCE 1 day ago FACET entity.name TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.SQLSvr.Cache) FACET entity.name, KEY_FIGURE WHERE KEY_FIGURE in ('DataHitRatio', 'ProcHitRatio') TIMESERIES 5 minutes SINCE 1 day ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.SQLSvr.BufferRead) FACET SYS_ID TIMESERIES 5 minutes SINCE 1 day ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.SQLSvr.CPU) FACET SYS_ID TIMESERIES 5 minutes SINCE 1 day ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(NR.SAP.DB.SQLSvr.AccessMethod) FACET entity.name, KEY_FIGURE TIMESERIES 5 minutes SINCE 1 day ago

FROM NR_SAP_HDB_REPLICATION SELECT latest(REPLICATION_MODE),latest(REPLICATION_STATUS), latest(SECONDARY_ACTIVE_STATUS), latest(SECONDARY_FULLY_RECOVERABLE),  latest(REPLICATION_STATUS_DETAILS), latest(HOST), latest(PORT), latest(SITE_NAME),  latest(SECONDARY_HOST), latest(SECONDARY_PORT), latest(SECONDARY_SITE_NAME)  FACET SITE_ID, SECONDARY_SITE_ID, VOLUME_ID SINCE  1 days ago

FROM NR_SAP_HDB_REPLICATION SELECT (latest(LAST_LOG_POSITION) - latest(SHIPPED_LOG_POSITION)) as 'Lagging Log Position',  latest(SHIPPED_LOG_POSITION) - latest(REPLAYED_LOG_POSITION) AS 'Lagging Log Replayed' FACET SITE_NAME, VOLUME_ID, SECONDARY_SITE_NAME SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 5 minutes
FROM NR_SAP_HDB_REPLICATION SELECT latest(LAST_SAVEPOINT_VERSION) - latest(SHIPPED_SAVEPOINT_VERSION) SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 5 minutes

FROM NR_SAP_HDB_REPLICATION SELECT SITE_ID, SECONDARY_SITE_ID, VOLUME_ID,LAST_LOG_POSITION_TIME,LAST_LOG_POSITION, SHIPPED_LOG_POSITION_TIME,SHIPPED_LOG_POSITION, REPLAYED_LOG_POSITION_TIME, REPLAYED_LOG_POSITION_TIME, REPLAYED_LOG_POSITION,SHIPPED_LOG_BUFFERS_DURATION SINCE  1 days ago LIMIT MAX

FROM NR_SAP_HDB_REPLICATION SELECT SITE_NAME, VOLUME_ID, LAST_SAVEPOINT_VERSION, SHIPPED_SAVEPOINT_VERSION,LAST_SAVEPOINT_START_TIME,SHIPPED_SAVEPOINT_START_TIME,LAST_SAVEPOINT_LOG_POSITION, SHIPPED_SAVEPOINT_LOG_POSITION SINCE  1 days ago

FROM NR_SAP_HDB_REPLICATION SELECT latest(SHIPPED_FULL_REPLICA_COUNT),latest(SHIPPED_FULL_REPLICA_SIZE),latest(SHIPPED_FULL_REPLICA_DURATION),latest(SHIPPED_LAST_FULL_REPLICA_SIZE) FACET SITE_ID, SECONDARY_SITE_ID, VOLUME_ID, SHIPPED_LAST_FULL_REPLICA_START_TIME, SHIPPED_LAST_FULL_REPLICA_END_TIME SINCE  1 days ago
